TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void InvokeCompletedEventHandler(object sender, InvokeCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed InvokeCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: A reference to the Web service proxy.
An containing the results of the method invocation.
Docs.summary: Represents an event handler that accepts the results of asynchronously invoked Web methods. This class cannot be inherited.
